lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court is deciding whether the island is an independent sovereign or a territory, a huge matter of pride and politics.
snippet: The Supreme Court is deciding whether the island is an independent sovereign or a territory, a huge matter of pride and politics.

headline.main: Justices Hear Case Over Puerto Rico’s Sovereignty
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Hears Case That Could Clarify Whether Puerto Rico Is Sovereign

abstract: Supreme Court case Puerto Rico v Sanchez Valle, which will weigh whether Puerto Rico is separate sovereign and can then pursue subsequent prosecution for same crime, may force decision on whether commonwealth is territory or independent sovereignty.
